Text.Page:
Looking for something? Just let me know. There may not be much because what the town is going through these days, but we can accommodate your needs.

Have you heard? I've heard our town was once rich by trading with the Shurians a long time ago. But the Shurians started to act strangely, and now there are only a few traces of them ever even being here. Well, I like the town the way it is now, calm and safe.
Oh! Hi, <PCNAME>. You look like you've been through a lot. I can tell from the air around you. Someone who enjoys facing danger. People like you are just marvelous.
